data.title: Angela Barbara Leonetti Obituary 2022
data.meta_description: Angela Barbara Leonetti, of Covington, passed away Wednesday, July 27, 2022, at the age of 75.       She was preceded in death by her husband, Peter Robert Leonetti; parents, Ro...
data.text:
Angela Barbara Leonetti, of Covington, passed away Wednesday, July 27, 2022, at the age of 75.

She was preceded in death by her husband, Peter Robert Leonetti; parents, Rocci and Rose Sposito; and brother, Bobby Sposito.

Survivors include her daughter, Love Rose Leonetti; son, Peter Gennaro Leonetti (Dawn); grandchildren, Peter Joseph Leonetti, Nicole Leonetti Sticher (Carl), Andrew Gennaro Leonetti, Anthony Robert Leonetti, Michael Craig Wise, and Ryan Seth Wise.

Angie was known for her love of animals, and the showing of horses. She met her husband at the age of fourteen and spent the rest of her life loving him. She took pride in her grandchildren and made sure to spend time with them.

A Memorial Service for Mrs. Leonetti will be held Wednesday, August 3, 2022, 6:30 P.M., at the Chapel of Caldwell & Cowan, 1215 Access Road, in Covington, with Pastor Gary Thompson officiating.
